triplets: Two-wheeled or three-wheeled vehicle designed for personal transportation
Short-distance travel, commuting, delivery services, and personal mobility
Metal frame (steel or aluminum), rubber tires, plastic body panels
Handlebars, wheels, deck/footboard, seat (if seated model), brakes, engine or electric motor, lights
Urban transport system, personal vehicle category
Honda, Yamaha, Vespa, Suzuki, Piaggio, Xiaomi (electric), and many others
80–150 kg for fuel scooters; 12–25 kg for electric kick scooters
